ttp_template:
<group name="backup_ntp_server_backup_ntp_server_type_preferred_ntp_server_preferred_ntp_server_type">
system time timezone {{TIMEZONE | ORPHRASE}}
system time ntp preferred_server {{PREFERRED_NTP_SERVER | ORPHRASE}}
system time ntp backup_server {{BACKUP_NTP_SERVER | ORPHRASE}}
system time ntp preferred_server_type {{PREFERRED_NTP_SERVER_TYPE | ORPHRASE}}
</group>
cli_content:
system time timezone UTC
system time ntp preferred_server 11.22.33.44
system time ntp backup_server 11.22.33.45
system time ntp preferred_server_type ipv4
system time ntp backup_server_type ipv4
